name: Dark Slowbro

abilities.name: Reel In
abilities.text: When you play Dark Slowbro from your hand, choose up to 3 Basic Pok√©mon and/or Evolution cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Fickle Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: It loves nothing better than to be left alone, and so sometimes ends up being manipulated by unscrupulous people.

strengths: Reel In provides excellent Pokemon recovery
Retrieves up to 3 Pokemon from discard
Fickle Attack can deal decent damage if lucky
weaknesses: Fickle Attack is 50% to do nothing
Reel In only works when played from hand

competitiveHistory: Dark Slowbro was primarily valued for its Reel In Pokemon Power, which provided excellent recovery for evolution decks. Being able to retrieve up to 3 Pokemon from the discard pile when evolved was powerful, especially after using Professor Oak or Computer Search. Fickle Attack's coin flip unreliability made it a poor main attacker, so it was typically used as a support Pokemon.

rulings.ruling: Reel In triggers when Dark Slowbro is played from your hand to evolve Slowpoke. It doesn't work with Rare Candy or similar effects.
You may choose 0, 1, 2, or 3 cards with Reel In.
Evolution cards include Stage 1 and Stage 2 Pokemon cards.
